contest-event.event-date:
June 20, 1891 D Hardraw Scar
Hardraw Scar 0 Entertainments Contest Hardraw Scar hardraw-scar
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Green Dragon Inn, Hardraw, North Yorkshire Prizes: £25, £18, £10, £6 Quickstep: 1. Besses, 2. Brighouse. 4 bands competed.
Jan. 2, 2012, 4:34 p.m. Nov. 17, 2017, 7:46 p.m.
1 Besses o' th' Barn Alexander Owen Rossini's Works / Rossini Fantasia / Reminiscences of Rossini [arr. Owen]
2 Leeds Forge Alexander Owen Heroic
3 Batley Old John Gladney Jnr Grand Selection: Mendelssohn's Works [arr. Godfrey]
4 Brighouse Subscription George F. Birkinshaw Meyerbeer [unknown arranger]
